Description: Pendant of white faience, the glaze is not preserved anymore, lug at one end broken off but still visible, other end broken off as well, rear is flat, frontal side is shown in relief, maybe poppy seed.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E14.1, upper level
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 71)
